instructions:
This character sheet is for **Fading Suns, Pax Alexius (a.k.a. 4th Edition) by Ulisses Spiele**.
Please go to [the dedicated wiki page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Fading Suns 4th Edition: Pax Alexius) for instructions on how to use the sheet.
You may also wish to check out the [project's README file](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/Fading%20Suns%204th%20Edition%20-%20Pax%20Alexius), which contains release notes and planned evolutions.

Issues, Ideas & Questions can be sent to the [admiralnlson](https://app.roll20.net/users/2324543), original author and current maintainer of this character sheet.
